data.text:
--------------- Order Rosales

-------------------- Family Cannabaceae, the hemp family EndoMycorrhizal

------------------------- Genus Cannabis

------------------------------ Species sativa L. (americana, chinensis, erratica, foetens, generalis, gigantea, indica, intersita, kafiristanica, lupulus, macrosperma, ruderalis) # toxic to dogs and cats # Cannabis / Marijuana / Hemp / Da ma / Cañamo de la India / Chanvre / Charas / Chira / Ganja / Gauja / Grass / Grifa / Guaza / Hanfkraut / Hashish / Hasis / Herbe / Indian hemp / Juana / Kif / Maconha / Marihuana / Marijane / Pot / Reefer / Tea / Weed / Yerba
